d415956deb14.name: The Coffeelicious
d415956deb14.shortDescription: Home to some of the best stories on medium.

paragraphs.text:
Despair is calling her name
Despair knows the game 
Despair feels like home 
Despair won’t leave her alone
paragraphs.name: ebba
d5a0
paragraphs.text:
But tomorrow I stay 
For despair no longer scares me away
I know its ins and outs 
I know how it laughs and how it cries
I know better not to believe its stories 
I am ready to give her back a life of glory

249b7079b577.title: All we can do everyday is to try to respond, to stop and anulate the toughtflow, to tight up every…

paragraphs.text: All we can do everyday is to try to respond, to stop and anulate the toughtflow, to tight up every string in our body to our mind till we feel that we are at a complete control, that may vary from gripping safe to a feeble and almost ethereal effort. Here comes another day we have to fight! And hey, this might be the day, and if it don’t, you have to understand to be thankful for you what you are and have.
paragraphs.name: a3be

paragraphs.text: Despair is a lack of hope, a lack of a path forward.
paragraphs.name: a43f

paragraphs.text: Hope…A belief there is such a path…out of being trapped in despair.
paragraphs.name: bd46

paragraphs.text: Without hope, one has no where to even take that first step…

paragraphs.text: Finding hope in hoplessness
paragraphs.name: d44b

paragraphs.text: Jessica this is really powerful! I survived a traumatic and abusive childhood as well. My experience was different than yours but some elements were the same. I admire your poetry and the courage it takes to confront the demons of your past.
paragraphs.name: d82a

664ade577af4.title: Thank you for the wisdom and the kindness Richard.
